Free OSS (MIT). Instant search engine with typo tolerance, faceted search, filtering, and sorting. Sub-50ms response times. REST API
Web scraping API with proxy rotation and CAPTCHA handling. Free plan: 1,000 API credits/month, 5 concurrent connections. No credit card required
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). Microsoft-backed end-to-end testing and browser automation for Chromium, Firefox, and WebKit. Auto-wait, network interception, mobile emulation
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). Google-backed Chrome/Chromium automation library. Headless and headful modes, PDF generation, screenshots, network interception. Firefox support via WebDriver BiDi
Free CDN for all npm packages. Any file on npm available via URL. Runs on Cloudflare Workers. No signup required
Free ESM-first CDN for npm packages. Serves ES modules with automatic dependency resolution, TypeScript support, and tree-shaking. Runs on Cloudflare
Free OSS (MIT). Virtual whiteboard for hand-drawn style diagrams. Real-time collaboration, end-to-end encryption, offline PWA. Also embeddable as React component
Free desktop design tool by Icons8. Auto layout, components, prototyping, collaboration (up to 10 editors), 10 cloud docs. Built-in library: 1.4M icons, 70K illustrations. Windows/Mac/Linux
Free online photo editor and design tool. Basic and advanced editing modes, 500K+ free graphics. Ad-supported, ~5 saves/day on free plan
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). CNCF graduated cloud-native container registry. RBAC, vulnerability scanning, image signing, replication, audit logging. Self-hosted
Public container registry. Always-free tier: 50 GB/month storage, 500 GB/month anonymous data transfer, 5 TB/month with AWS account
Real-time error, feature, and log reporting. Free plan: 3,000 events/month, 1 project, 1 user, 3-day retention. Also fully open source (Apache 2.0) for self-hosted unlimited use
Chat, Activity Feeds, and Video APIs. Maker Account (free): 2,000 MAU chat, 125K API calls/month feeds, 333K participant-minutes/month video. Hard limits, no surprise overages
Authentication and user management. Free Forever plan: 7,500 MAU, 10 tenants, 3 SSO connections. All core auth methods: passwords, magic links, OTP, passkeys, social login, MFA
Passkey-first authentication. Cloud free tier: 10,000 MAU, 2 production projects. Also open source (AGPL v3) for unlimited self-hosted use. WebAuthn, OAuth, email/password
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). Red Hat-backed identity and access management. SSO, OIDC, SAML, LDAP, social login, MFA, fine-grained authorization. Self-hosted with no user limits
Ultra-fast LLM inference API. Free tier: 1M tokens/day, 30 requests/min. Models include Llama 3.1 8B/70B, Qwen3 32B/235B. Multi-thousand tokens/sec inference speed
AI model API. Trial key: 1,000 API calls/month across all endpoints (Chat, Embed, Rerank). Access to Command R+, Rerank 3.5, Embed 4. Non-commercial use only
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). Self-hostable PaaS (Vercel/Heroku alternative). Deploy static sites, databases, full-stack apps, 280+ one-click services. Auto SSL, Git integration
Free OSS (MIT). Cloud-native reverse proxy and load balancer. Automatic HTTPS via Let's Encrypt, Docker/Kubernetes integration, middleware plugins, service discovery
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). CNCF graduated GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes. Declarative, versioned, automated application deployments from Git
Free OSS (MIT). High-performance job queue for Node.js built on Redis. Delayed jobs, retries, priorities, concurrency, rate limiting, repeatable jobs
Free OSS (AGPL-3.0). Self-hosted workflow automation (Zapier alternative). Connect services like Slack, GitHub, Google Sheets. No programming knowledge required
Free OSS (MIT). Self-hosted headless CMS with REST and GraphQL APIs. Content types builder, RBAC, webhooks, i18n, media library. 200K+ active projects
Free OSS (MIT). TypeScript-first headless CMS with code-based config. REST and GraphQL APIs, access control, hooks, live preview. Self-hosted or Payload Cloud
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). CNCF graduated time-series monitoring and alerting. Pull-based metrics collection, PromQL query language, multi-dimensional data model
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). CNCF graduated distributed tracing system. End-to-end request tracing, performance optimization, root cause analysis. OpenTelemetry compatible
Free OSS (AGPLv3). Horizontally-scalable log aggregation system by Grafana Labs. Label-based indexing (like Prometheus for logs), integrates with Grafana dashboards
Free OSS (AGPLv3). Privacy-friendly web analytics. No cookies, GDPR/CCPA compliant, lightweight script (<1KB). Self-hosted with no limits. Cloud plans start at $9/mo
Free OSS (MIT). Simple, privacy-focused web analytics. No cookies, GDPR compliant, real-time dashboard, event tracking. Self-hosted with no limits
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). Community fork of Drone CI. Container-native CI/CD with YAML pipelines, multi-platform support, Gitea/Forgejo/GitHub/GitLab integration
Free OSS (MIT). API development ecosystem — REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, SSE, Socket.IO, MQTT testing. Real-time collaboration, environments, collections. Web, desktop, and CLI
Free OSS (MIT). Lightweight self-hosted Git service. Repository hosting, issue tracking, pull requests, CI/CD (Gitea Actions), packages registry. Low resource usage
Free OSS (Apache 2.0). Low-code platform for building internal tools. Drag-and-drop UI builder, 45+ database/API integrations, JavaScript customization. Self-hosted or cloud
